skins.name: Roccia
skins.description: A unique outfit Roccia wears when doing improv comedy. Made out of various scraps, this product of love is decorated with odds and ends that Roccia has accumulated.

tags.name: Traction
tags.description: Pulls targets within range towards a specific position

tags.name: Havoc DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides Havoc DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

tags.name: Basic Attack DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides Basic Attack DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

163.name: When Shadows Engulf the Hull
163.description:
Casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Acrobatic Trick</color> grants {0} additional <te href=850015>Imagination</te> and {1} Concerto Energy.
Immune to interruptions when casting Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Real Fantasy</color>

164.name: When the Luceanite Gleams
164.description: Casting Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Real Fantasy</color> grants all Resonators in the team {0} Havoc DMG Bonus for {2}s, stacking up to <SapTag=1>{1}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=time P=times SapTag=1}. Upon reaching the max stacks, it grants all Resonators in the team {3} additional Havoc DMG Bonus for {4}s.

165.name: When the Heart Sees and Hands Feel
165.description: Casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Pero, Help</color> increases Roccia's Crit. Rate by {0} and Crit. DMG by {1} for {2}s.

166.name: When Wonders Gather in the Box
166.description: Casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Acrobatic Trick</color> increases Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Real Fantasy</color>'s DMG Multiplier by {0} for {1}s.

167.name: When Dreams Are Reborn on Stage
167.description: Increase Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Commedia Improvviso!</color>'s DMG Multiplier by {0} and <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color>'s DMG Multiplier by {1}.

168.name: When the Golden Wings Fly
168.description:
Casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Commedia Improvviso!</color> grants the following effects for {0}s:
- Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Real Fantasy</color> ignores enemies' DEF by {1}.
- When Roccia lands after performing Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Real Fantasy</color> Stage 3, she is launched into mid-air, activating <color=Highlight><te href=850016>Beyond Imagination</te></color>. In this state, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> becomes Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Reality Recreation</color>, dealing DMG equal to {2} of Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Real Fantasy</color> Stage 3 DMG, considered Heavy Attack DMG. Roccia is immune to interruptions while casting Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Reality Recreation</color>.
- When Roccia lands after performing Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Reality Recreation</color>, she is launched into mid-air, activating <color=Highlight><te href=850016>Beyond Imagination</te></color>. Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Reality Recreation</color> is only available in the <color=Highlight><te href=850016>Beyond Imagination</te></color> state.

params.name: Pero, Easy
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to attack, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>. Hitting a target with at least {0} <te href=850015>Imagination</te> sends Roccia into mid-air and activates the <color=Highlight>Beyond Imagination</color> state. The longer you hold the <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> button, the more Imagination Roccia gains. In this state, Roccia can continue to charge the attack even when her STA depletes. Heavy Attack will be automatically cast when you release the <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> button while charging or when Imagination reaches the max limit.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to perform a Plunging Attack, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
Use <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> right after a successful <color=Highlight>Dodge</color> to attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.

1606023.name: STA Cost per Second while Charging

params.name: Acrobatic Trick
params.description: Roccia projects her creativity into reality, pulling in nearby targets and dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>. She then launches into mid-air and activates the <color=Highlight><te href=850016>Beyond Imagination</te></color> state.

params.name: Commedia Improvviso!
params.description: Roccia's improvised comedy begins! Deal <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color> to the target, considered Heavy Attack DMG. For every {1} of Roccia's Crit. Rate over {0}, this skill increases the ATK of all Resonators in the team by <SapTag=2>{2}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=point P=points SapTag=2} for {3}s, up to {4} points.

params.name: Immersive Performance
params.description: Casting Resonance Skill or Heavy Attack increases Roccia's ATK by {0} for {1}s.

params.name: Super Attractive Magic Box
params.description:
After casting Outro Skill, the Utility of the incoming Resonator is replaced with Magic Box.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Magic Box</color></size>
- Upon use, pull nearby targets toward the Magic Box, dealing {1} points of <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>. This skill is considered Echo Skill that deals Utility DMG.
- The Magic Box lasts for {0}s or until the Resonator is switched out.

params.name: Pero, Help
params.description: Attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>. Use <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> right after casting this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 4</color>.

params.name: A Prop Master Prepares
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Beyond Imagination</color></size>
- When Roccia is in <color=Highlight>Beyond Imagination</color> with at least {0} Imagination, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} the <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> button to consume {0} Imagination to cast Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Real Fantasy</color>.
- Roccia exits this state when she is not airborne or when switched off the field.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - Real Fantasy</color></size>
- Perform up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>, considered Heavy Attack DMG. When Roccia lands after Stage 1 and Stage 2 attacks with over {0} Imagination, she will launch into mid-air and activate <color=Highlight>Beyond Imagination</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Imagination</color></size>
Roccia can hold up to {1} Imagination.
- Dealing DMG with Normal Attacks restores Imagination.
- Hold <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> to charge the next attack while restoring Imagination.
- Casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Acrobatic Trick</color> restores {2} Imagination.
- Casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Pero, Help</color> restores {3} Imagination.

params.name: Applause, Please!
params.description: The incoming Resonator has their Havoc DMG Amplified by {0} and Basic Attack DMG Amplified by {1} for {2}s or until the Resonator is switched out.

params.name: Tune Break: Gauntlets
params.description: When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, the Resonator may cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
